replies.body: brb gonna have to break daughter's lego figures

Upon breaking them all i have concluded that i dont have enough lego to make any of the champs i thought of

Now i need to make her stuff again{{item:3070}}
Childhood Lego Dreams ACTIVATED!
When do we find out the winners? Said it would be announced yesterday {{item:3070}} {{champion:72}}
As a pixel artist I am quite upset that no digital media can be submitted to this competition. ah well.
We've done a number of art competitions this year. This time around we wanted to offer a different kind of competition for the community to try their hand at.
Can I use the Lego Digital Designer or any other software for this comp?
The end product (your submission) for the lego contest needs to be lego blocks.
So can l use the program (that allows me to build thing out of lego) or not? Or does it have to be real life?
You need to learn the difference between "lego blocks" and pixels on a screen...
The end product must be made out of lego blocks in real life.
Sounds like great fun, but can we use Beados instead? I can't seem to find any Hama Beads.
I will accept Beados
Can we use just ordinary beads, or does it have to be hama beads?
Do you have an example?
Looking forward to it!
Which one are you thinking of entering? :)
Hey Riot. Do you think as the top lane battle boss skin you could have {{champion:27}} ? since if you replace his bottle with a arcade machine he really fits into the theme :)

Does it have to be 100% lego, i was planning on making thresh but then i realised i can't make the lantern or scythe, would i be ok if i used just a wee bit of fishing line for support

Also, this is one of my favourite things riot has done, doubt i'll win it but i'll try anyway!
If the fishing line makes up less than 5% of the lego structure, I will accept it.
I haven't got a brain{{champion:9}}
Stepping on lego is hard enough{{item:3151}}
For the Lego comp on instagram the tag #legolol is full of Lego Laugh out loud posts. Is there an alternate tag I can post my entry on?
{{champion:63}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3931}} DOES IT WORK ?
I wish I hade Lego =[
or a PROJECT{{champion:222}}
Riot can you make a skin called PROJECT{{champion:103}}
Can you only submit one?
You can have more than one entry.
Can we sub in Minecraft for Lego?
It needs to be Lego for the lego competition.
If you are one of the top five winners, and you win arcade riven and battle boss blitzcrank, do we have to already have both riven and blitz or will we win the champions as well as the skins?
You win the skin and the champions if you don't already own them.
why no cross stitching :c
dam this looks great
It's the 10th now, why have the winners not been announced {{item:3151}}
